baselines.description: RTT baselines for selecting, int64 values of time.Duration

maxRtt.description: max acceptable rtt, filter away high delay nodes. defalut 0

github:v2fly_v2ray-core_v5_infra_conf_sy.description: DNSConfig is a JSON serializable object for dns.Config.
HealthCheckSettings holds settings for health Checker

port.description:
Port of this Point server.
Deprecated: Port exists for historical compatibility
and should not be used.

inbound.description:
Deprecated: InboundConfig exists for historical compatibility
and should not be used.

outbound.description:
Deprecated: OutboundConfig exists for historical compatibility
and should not be used.

inboundDetour.description:
Deprecated: InboundDetours exists for historical compatibility
and should not be used.

outboundDetour.description:
Deprecated: OutboundDetours exists for historical compatibility
and should not be used.

github:v2fly_v2ray-core_v5_infra_conf_v4.description: TrojanClientConfig is configuration of trojan servers
TrojanServerTarget is configuration of a single trojan server

id.description: ID of the account, in the form of a UUID, e.g., "66ad4540-b58c-4ad2-9926-ea63445a9b57".

encryption.description: Encryption settings. Only applies to client side, and only accepts "none" for now.

title: JSON schema for V2Ray jsonv4 configuration
